palamuwa panduwata pahara dun supar kings kandayama kadulu 5 kata lakunu 164 k ras kala athara pilithuru washayen pune woriyars pilata labagatha hakiwuye kadulu 7 k dawi lakunu 151 k pamani.chennayi supar kings kadulu 5 ta lakunu 164 yi.plesis 58, badrinath 57 (samuwals 39 ta 3, sera 23 ta 2) pune woriyars kadulu 7 ta lakunu 151 yi.ganguli 24, samuwals 26, smith 23, anjalo mathiws, kulasekara 10 ta 2, brawo 28 ta 2tharagaye wira kewin pitarsan nodawi laba gath shathakaya matha dekan chajars pilata erehiwa pawathi indiya primiyar lig tharagaya thawath pandu 5 k pamanak ithiriwa thibiyadi kadulu 5 kin jaya ganimata dilli deyardewils pilata hakiwiya.
